title: The Dark Knight Rises
cast: Christian Bale, Tom Hardy, Anne Hathaway
plotSummary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is forced to return to protect Gotham City from the brutal revolutionary Bane.

title: Inception
plotSummary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology...

title: Interstellar
cast: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
plotSummary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
cast: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult
plotSummary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search of her homeland.

title: The Revenant
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Domhnall Gleeson
plotSummary: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead.

title: Joker
cast: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz
plotSummary: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime in Gotham City.

cast: George MacKay, Dean-Charles Chapman, Mark Strong
plotSummary: Two young British soldiers are given an impossible mission during WWI: deliver a message that will stop a deadly attack.

title: Ford v Ferrari
cast: Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal
plotSummary: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference to build a revolutionary race car.
